synopsis.text: Ju-ken prodigy Kizuna Todoroki, hailing from the prestigious Wadachi school, finds herself in a whirlwind of challenges and interviews after clinching the 10th ASN Martial Arts World Championship. Despite her impressive victory over reigning champion Everest Choyama, controversy arises as Kizuna is revealed to be two days shy of the minimum age requirement. As the Todoroki family prepares for an interview with a journalist, a slew of challengers descend upon them, eager to dethrone the young champion before her upcoming birthday. Amidst the chaos, Kizuna must defend her title and share her inspiring journey with the world. This anime is a product of the Young Animator Training Project, an initiative backed by the Agency of Cultural Affairs of Japan and executed by the Japan Animation Creators Association.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
